attributes.action: explain why he claimed £17,000+ for 2nd home expenses from the tax payer when he is provided with two grace and favour homes as prime minister again funded by the tax payer. also did he claim these expenses whilst chancellor from 1997 when again he had state provided accommodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
